info.title: Stirling PDF API
info.description:
API documentation for all Server-Side processing.
Please note some functionality might be UI only and missing from here.

post.summary: Sanitize a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint processes a PDF file and removes specific elements based on the provided options. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Remove password from a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint removes the password from a protected PDF file. Users need to provide the existing password. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Remove digital signature from PDF
post.description: This endpoint accepts a PDF file and returns the PDF file without the digital signature. Input: PDF, Output: PDF

post.summary: Summary here
post.description: desc. Input:PDF Output:JSON Type:SISO

post.summary: Sign PDF with a Digital Certificate
post.description: This endpoint accepts a PDF file, a digital certificate and related information to sign the PDF. It then returns the digitally signed PDF file. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Redacts listOfText in a PDF document
post.description: This operation takes an input PDF file and redacts the provided listOfText. Input:PDF, Output:PDF, Type:SISO

post.summary: Add watermark to a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint adds a watermark to a given PDF file. Users can specify the watermark type (text or image), rotation, opacity, width spacer, and height spacer. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Add password to a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint adds password protection to a PDF file. Users can specify a set of permissions that should be applied to the file. Input:PDF Output:PDF

post.summary: Update metadata of a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint allows you to update the metadata of a given PDF file. You can add, modify, or delete standard and custom metadata fields. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Grabs all JS from a PDF and returns a single JS file with all code
post.description: desc. Input:PDF Output:JS Type:SISO

post.summary: Replace-Invert Color PDF
post.description: This endpoint accepts a PDF file and option of invert all colors or replace text and background colors. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Repair a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint repairs a given PDF file by running Ghostscript command. The PDF is first saved to a temporary location, repaired, read back, and then returned as a response. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Remove blank pages from a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint removes blank pages from a given PDF file. Users can specify the threshold and white percentage to tune the detection of blank pages. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Process a PDF file with OCR
post.description: This endpoint processes a PDF file using OCR (Optical Character Recognition). Users can specify languages, sidecar, deskew, clean, cleanFinal, ocrType, ocrRenderType, and removeImagesAfter options. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SI-Conditional

post.summary: Flatten PDF form fields or full page
post.description: Flattening just PDF form fields or converting each page to images to make text unselectable. Input: PDF, Output: PDF. Type: SISO

post.summary: Extract images from a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint extracts images from a given PDF file and returns them in a zip file. Users can specify the output image format. Input: PDF Output: IMAGE/ZIP Type: SIMO

post.summary: Extract image scans from an input file
post.description: This endpoint extracts image scans from a given file based on certain parameters. Users can specify angle threshold, tolerance, minimum area, minimum contour area, and border size. Input:PDF Output:IMAGE/ZIP Type:SIMO

requestBody.description: Form data containing file and extraction parameters

post.summary: Optimize PDF file
post.description: This endpoint accepts a PDF file and optimizes it based on the provided parameters. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Auto split PDF pages into separate documents
post.description: This endpoint accepts a PDF file, scans each page for a specific QR code, and splits the document at the QR code boundaries. The output is a zip file containing each separate PDF document. Input:PDF Output:ZIP-PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Extract header from PDF file
post.description: This endpoint accepts a PDF file and attempts to extract its title or header based on heuristics. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Add stamp to a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint adds a stamp to a given PDF file. Users can specify the stamp type (text or image), rotation, opacity, width spacer, and height spacer. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Add page numbers to a PDF document
post.description: This operation takes an input PDF file and adds page numbers to it. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Overlay image onto a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint overlays an image onto a PDF file at the specified coordinates. The image can be overlaid on every page of the PDF if specified.  Input:PDF/IMAGE Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Split PDF pages into smaller sections
post.description: Split each page of a PDF into smaller sections based on the user's choice (halves, thirds, quarters, etc.), both vertically and horizontally. Input:PDF Output:ZIP-PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Split PDFs by Chapters
post.description: Splits a PDF into chapters and returns a ZIP file.

post.summary: Split a PDF file into separate documents
post.description: This endpoint splits a given PDF file into separate documents based on the specified page numbers or ranges. Users can specify pages using individual numbers, ranges, or 'all' for every page. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SIMO

post.summary: Auto split PDF pages into separate documents based on size or count
post.description:
split PDF into multiple paged documents based on size/count, ie if 20 pages and split into 5, it does 5 documents each 4 pages
 if 10MB and each page is 1MB and you enter 2MB then 5 docs each 2MB (rounded so that it accepts 1.9MB but not 2.1MB) Input:PDF Output:ZIP-PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Change the size of a PDF page/document
post.description: This operation takes an input PDF file and the size to scale the pages to in the output PDF file. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Rotate a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint rotates a given PDF file by a specified angle. The angle must be a multiple of 90. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Remove pages from a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint removes specified pages from a given PDF file. Users can provide a comma-separated list of page numbers or ranges to delete. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Remove images from file to reduce the file size.
post.description: This endpoint remove images from file to reduce the file size.Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:MISO

post.summary: Rearrange pages in a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint rearranges pages in a given PDF file based on the specified page order or custom mode. Users can provide a page order as a comma-separated list of page numbers or page ranges, or a custom mode. Input:PDF Output:PDF

post.summary: Convert a multi-page PDF into a single long page PDF
post.description: This endpoint converts a multi-page PDF document into a single paged PDF document. The width of the single page will be same as the input's width, but the height will be the sum of all the pages' heights. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Overlay PDF files in various modes
post.description: Overlay PDF files onto a base PDF with different modes: Sequential, Interleaved, or Fixed Repeat. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:MIMO

post.summary: Merge multiple pages of a PDF document into a single page
post.description: This operation takes an input PDF file and the number of pages to merge into a single sheet in the output PDF file. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Merge multiple PDF files into one
post.description: This endpoint merges multiple PDF files into a single PDF file. The merged file will contain all pages from the input files in the order they were provided. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:MISO

post.summary: Crops a PDF document
post.description: This operation takes an input PDF file and crops it according to the given coordinates. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Checks if a PDF is of a certain size
post.description: Input:PDF Output:Boolean Type:SISO

post.summary: Checks if a PDF is of a certain rotation
post.description: Input:PDF Output:Boolean Type:SISO

post.summary: Checks if a PDF is greater, less or equal to a setPageCount
post.description: Input:PDF Output:Boolean Type:SISO

post.summary: Checks if a PDF is a set file size
post.description: Input:PDF Output:Boolean Type:SISO

post.summary: Checks if a PDF contains set text, returns true if does
post.description: Input:PDF Output:Boolean Type:SISO

post.summary: Checks if a PDF contains an image
post.description: Input:PDF Output:Boolean Type:SISO

post.summary: Convert a URL to a PDF
post.description: This endpoint fetches content from a URL and converts it to a PDF format. Input:N/A Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Convert PDF to XML
post.description: This endpoint converts a PDF file to an XML file. Input:PDF Output:XML Type:SISO

post.summary: Convert PDF to Word document
post.description: This endpoint converts a given PDF file to a Word document format. Input:PDF Output:WORD Type:SISO

post.summary: Convert PDF to Text or RTF format
post.description: This endpoint converts a given PDF file to Text or RTF format. Input:PDF Output:TXT Type:SISO

post.summary: Convert PDF to Presentation format
post.description: This endpoint converts a given PDF file to a Presentation format. Input:PDF Output:PPT Type:SISO

post.summary: Convert a PDF to a PDF/A
post.description: This endpoint converts a PDF file to a PDF/A file. PDF/A is a format designed for long-term archiving of digital documents. Input:PDF Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Convert PDF to image(s)
post.description: This endpoint converts a PDF file to image(s) with the specified image format, color type, and DPI. Users can choose to get a single image or multiple images.  Input:PDF Output:Image Type:SI-Conditional

post.summary: Convert PDF to HTML
post.description: This endpoint converts a PDF file to HTML format. Input:PDF Output:HTML Type:SISO

post.summary: Extracts a CSV document from a PDF
post.description: This operation takes an input PDF file and returns CSV file of whole page. Input:PDF Output:CSV Type:SISO

post.summary: Convert a Markdown file to PDF
post.description: This endpoint takes a Markdown file input, converts it to HTML, and then to PDF format. Input:MARKDOWN Output:PDF Type:SISO

post.summary: Convert images to a PDF file
post.description: This endpoint converts one or more images to a PDF file. Users can specify whether to stretch the images to fit the PDF page, and whether to automatically rotate the images. Input:Image Output:PDF Type:MISO

post.summary: Convert an HTML or ZIP (containing HTML and CSS) to PDF
post.description: This endpoint takes an HTML or ZIP file input and converts it to a PDF format.

post.summary: Convert a file to a PDF using LibreOffice
post.description: This endpoint converts a given file to a PDF using LibreOffice API  Input:ANY Output:PDF Type:SISO

get.description: This endpoint returns the status of the application and its version number.
This endpoint returns the total count of POST requests for a specific endpoint or all endpoints.

get.summary: Unique users count for POST requests
get.description: This endpoint returns the count of unique users for POST requests for a specific endpoint or all endpoints.

get.summary: POST requests count for all endpoints
get.description: This endpoint returns the count of POST requests for each endpoint.

get.summary: Unique users count for POST requests for all endpoints
get.description: This endpoint returns the count of unique users for POST requests for each endpoint.
This endpoint returns the total count of GET requests for a specific endpoint or all endpoints.

get.summary: Unique users count for GET requests
get.description: This endpoint returns the count of unique users for GET requests for a specific endpoint or all endpoints.

get.summary: GET requests count for all endpoints
get.description: This endpoint returns the count of GET requests for each endpoint.

get.summary: Unique users count for GET requests for all endpoints
get.description: This endpoint returns the count of unique users for GET requests for each endpoint.

removeJavaScript.description: Remove JavaScript actions from the PDF

removeEmbeddedFiles.description: Remove embedded files from the PDF

password.description: The password of the PDF file

certType.description: The type of the digital certificate

password.description: The password for the keystore or the private key

showSignature.description: Whether to visually show the signature in the PDF file

reason.description: The reason for signing the PDF

location.description: The location where the PDF is signed

pageNumber.description: The page number where the signature should be visible. This is required if showSignature is set to true

showLogo.description: Whether to visually show a signature logo along with the signature

listOfText.description: List of text to redact from the PDF

useRegex.description: Whether to use regex for the listOfText

wholeWordSearch.description: Whether to use whole word search

convertPDFToImage.description: Convert the redacted PDF to an image

fontSize.description: The font size of the watermark text

rotation.description: The rotation of the watermark in degrees

widthSpacer.description: The width spacer between watermark elements

heightSpacer.description: The height spacer between watermark elements

convertPDFToImage.description: Convert the redacted PDF to an image

ownerPassword.description: The owner password to be added to the PDF file (Restricts what can be done with the document once it is opened)

password.description: The password to be added to the PDF file (Restricts the opening of the document itself.)

keyLength.description: The length of the encryption key

canAssembleDocument.description: Whether the document assembly is allowed

canExtractContent.description: Whether content extraction for accessibility is allowed

canExtractForAccessibility.description: Whether content extraction for accessibility is allowed

canModify.description: Whether the document modification is allowed

canModifyAnnotations.description: Whether modification of annotations is allowed

canPrint.description: Whether printing of the document is allowed

deleteAll.description: Delete all metadata if set to true

creationDate.description: The creation date of the document (format: yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss)

modificationDate.description: The modification date of the document (format: yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss)

trapped.description: The trapped status of the document

additionalProperties.description: Map list of key and value of custom parameters. Note these must start with customKey and customValue if they are non-standard

allRequestParams.description: Map list of key and value of custom parameters. Note these must start with customKey and customValue if they are non-standard

replaceAndInvertOption.description: Replace and Invert color options of a pdf.

highContrastColorCombination.description: If HIGH_CONTRAST_COLOR option selected, then pick the default color option for text and background.

backGroundColor.description: If CUSTOM_COLOR option selected, then pick the custom color for background. Expected color value should be 24bit decimal value of a color

textColor.description: If CUSTOM_COLOR option selected, then pick the custom color for text. Expected color value should be 24bit decimal value of a color

threshold.description: The threshold value to determine blank pages

whitePercent.description: The percentage of white color on a page to consider it as blank

languages.description: List of languages to use in OCR processing

items.description: List of languages to use in OCR processing

sidecar.description: Include OCR text in a sidecar text file if set to true

deskew.description: Deskew the input file if set to true

clean.description: Clean the input file if set to true

cleanFinal.description: Clean the final output if set to true

ocrType.description: Specify the OCR type, e.g., 'skip-text', 'force-ocr', or 'Normal'

ocrRenderType.description: Specify the OCR render type, either 'hocr' or 'sandwich'

removeImagesAfter.description: Remove images from the output PDF if set to true

flattenOnlyForms.description: True to flatten only the forms, false to flatten full PDF (Convert page to image)

format.description: The output image format e.g., 'png', 'jpeg', or 'gif'

allowDuplicates.description: Boolean to enable/disable the saving of duplicate images, true to enable duplicates

angleThreshold.description: The angle threshold for the image scan extraction

tolerance.description: The tolerance for the image scan extraction

minArea.description: The minimum area for the image scan extraction

minContourArea.description: The minimum contour area for the image scan extraction

borderSize.description: The border size for the image scan extraction

optimizeLevel.description: The level of optimization to apply to the PDF file. Higher values indicate greater compression but may reduce quality.

expectedOutputSize.description: The expected output size, e.g. '100MB', '25KB', etc.

duplexMode.description: Flag indicating if the duplex mode is active, where the page after the divider also gets removed.

useFirstTextAsFallback.description: Flag indicating whether to use the first text as a fallback if no suitable title is found. Defaults to false.

pageNumbers.description: The pages to select, Supports ranges (e.g., '1,3,5-9'), or 'all' or functions in the format 'an+b' where 'a' is the multiplier of the page number 'n', and 'b' is a constant (e.g., '2n+1', '3n', '6n-5')"

fontSize.description: The font size of the stamp text

rotation.description: The rotation of the stamp in degrees

position.description: Position for stamp placement based on a 1-9 grid (1: bottom-left, 2: bottom-center, ..., 9: top-right)

overrideX.description: Override X coordinate for stamp placement. If set, it will override the position-based calculation. Negative value means no override.

overrideY.description: Override Y coordinate for stamp placement. If set, it will override the position-based calculation. Negative value means no override.

customMargin.description: Specifies the margin size for the stamp.

pageNumbers.description: The pages to select, Supports ranges (e.g., '1,3,5-9'), or 'all' or functions in the format 'an+b' where 'a' is the multiplier of the page number 'n', and 'b' is a constant (e.g., '2n+1', '3n', '6n-5')"

pagesToNumber.description: Which pages to number, default all

customText.description: Custom text: defaults to just number but can have things like "Page {n} of {p}"

x.description: The x-coordinate at which to place the top-left corner of the image.

y.description: The y-coordinate at which to place the top-left corner of the image.

everyPage.description: Whether to overlay the image onto every page of the PDF.

horizontalDivisions.description: Number of horizontal divisions for each PDF page

verticalDivisions.description: Number of vertical divisions for each PDF page

merge.description: Merge the split documents into a single PDF

includeMetadata.description: Whether to include Metadata or not

allowDuplicates.description: Whether to allow duplicates or not

pageNumbers.description: The pages to select, Supports ranges (e.g., '1,3,5-9'), or 'all' or functions in the format 'an+b' where 'a' is the multiplier of the page number 'n', and 'b' is a constant (e.g., '2n+1', '3n', '6n-5')"

splitType.description: Determines the type of split: 0 for size, 1 for page count, 2 for document count

splitValue.description: Value for split: size in MB (e.g., '10MB') or number of pages (e.g., '5')

pageSize.description: The scale of pages in the output PDF. Acceptable values are A0-A6, LETTER, LEGAL, KEEP.

scaleFactor.description: The scale of the content on the pages of the output PDF. Acceptable values are floats.

angle.description: The angle by which to rotate the PDF file. This should be a multiple of 90.

pageNumbers.description: The pages to select, Supports ranges (e.g., '1,3,5-9'), or 'all' or functions in the format 'an+b' where 'a' is the multiplier of the page number 'n', and 'b' is a constant (e.g., '2n+1', '3n', '6n-5')"

customMode.description:
The custom mode for page rearrangement. Valid values are:
REVERSE_ORDER: Reverses the order of all pages.
DUPLEX_SORT: Sorts pages as if all fronts were scanned then all backs in reverse (1, n, 2, n-1, ...). BOOKLET_SORT: Arranges pages for booklet printing (last, first, second, second last, ...).
ODD_EVEN_SPLIT: Splits and arranges pages into odd and even numbered pages.
ODD_EVEN_MERGE: Merges pages and organises them alternately into odd and even pages.
REMOVE_FIRST: Removes the first page.
REMOVE_LAST: Removes the last page.
REMOVE_FIRST_AND_LAST: Removes both the first and the last pages.

overlayFiles.description: An array of PDF files to be used as overlays on the base PDF. The order in these files is applied based on the selected mode.

overlayMode.description: The mode of overlaying: 'SequentialOverlay' for sequential application, 'InterleavedOverlay' for round-robin application, 'FixedRepeatOverlay' for fixed repetition based on provided counts

counts.description: An array of integers specifying the number of times each corresponding overlay file should be applied in the 'FixedRepeatOverlay' mode. This should match the length of the overlayFiles array.

items.description: An array of integers specifying the number of times each corresponding overlay file should be applied in the 'FixedRepeatOverlay' mode. This should match the length of the overlayFiles array.

overlayPosition.description: Overlay position 0 is Foregound, 1 is Background

pagesPerSheet.description: The number of pages to fit onto a single sheet in the output PDF.

addBorder.description: Boolean for if you wish to add border around the pages

sortType.description: The type of sorting to be applied on the input files before merging.

x.description: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the crop area

y.description: The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the crop area

width.description: The width of the crop area

height.description: The height of the crop area

comparator.description: The comparison type, accepts Greater, Equal, Less than
The comparison type, accepts Greater, Equal, Less than
The comparison type, accepts Greater, Equal, Less than
The comparison type, accepts Greater, Equal, Less than

pageNumbers.description: The pages to select, Supports ranges (e.g., '1,3,5-9'), or 'all' or functions in the format 'an+b' where 'a' is the multiplier of the page number 'n', and 'b' is a constant (e.g., '2n+1', '3n', '6n-5')"

urlInput.description: The input URL to be converted to a PDF file

outputFormat.description: The output Text or RTF format

singleOrMultiple.description: Choose between a single image containing all pages or separate images for each page

colorType.description: The color type of the output image(s)

dpi.description: The DPI (dots per inch) for the output image(s)

fileInput.description: The input images to be converted to a PDF file

fitOption.description: Option to determine how the image will fit onto the page

colorType.description: The color type of the output image(s)

autoRotate.description: Whether to automatically rotate the images to better fit the PDF page

zoom.description: Zoom level for displaying the website. Default is '1'.
